name: Way of the Kensei
description: Weapon masters who treat their armaments as extensions of the body and spirit.

3.name: Path of the Kensei
3.description: Choose two weapons as kensei weapons and gain benefits such as Agile Parry, Kensei's Shot, and proficiency with calligrapher's or painter's supplies.

6.name: One with the Blade
6.description: Your kensei weapons count as magical, and you can spend 1 ki point to deal extra damage with them once per turn.

11.name: Sharpen the Blade
11.description: As a bonus action, spend up to 3 ki points to grant a kensei weapon a bonus to attack and damage rolls equal to the ki points spent for 1 minute.

17.name: Unerring Accuracy
17.description: If you miss with a monk weapon attack on your turn, reroll the attack roll once.

choices.name: Way of the Kensei Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Way of the Kensei subclass
